text:
This song got us pumpin' like! You can do it, whelp
You can claw 'em, gnaw 'em, stone 'em, beat 'em
I'll do this with my mind, you just obey me!
And do you stammer, stammer, seein' my eye?
You better star me, steam me, see me, scrub me, feed me my pie
You ready already, or wheezy oh? And bestial crushin', easy though
And totally the very top DNA, now!
You need a shanty, shanty, shanty: a song
You're an extremely scary regent that conquers us all, you go

Bananananananananananana
Bananananananananananana
Banananananananananananana

text: OMG that made me so mad when I was a kid. text:
I remember this! XD
Being the big bro I had all my sisters and little bro in my room cheering for me when I fought this beast...And then I lost and lost my cool as well so I threw all of my siblings outta my room :P Young and angry ^^
But I felt bad afterwards and invited them back and that's when I defeated K. Rool, then the credits rolled with the music playing....And my tears rolled down because I realized that I had finished an awesome game :,(

Good times...
